document_data.name: Lime
document_data.mainbody:
{{Otheruses4|the fruit|the material|lime (material)}}
'''Limes''' were a type of citrus fruit, grown from [[tree]]s of the same name, found in the Realms.
document_data.Availability:
Places in the Realms where limes were known to be cultivated included:
* In [[west Faerun]]'s [[Lands of Intrigue]] region, limes were cultivated in abundance by the town of [[Imnescar]].
document_data.Usages of Limes:
* [[Mulled brew]], a drink that often contained a slice of lime or [[apple]].{{Cite dragon/299/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: Moon Mountain Brewery|81}}
* Limes were among the multitude of things [[Stuffed giant squid|stuffed into giant squids]] in the town of [[Tulmene]].

Notable Users of Lime.General: * Some sailors kept limes on their ships, stored within chests of sand, in order to stave off [[scurvy]].{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2007)/Scurvy in the Realms}}
Notable Users of Lime.Restaurants & Taverns:
* [[Blackthorn's Brew]] served lastbowl, a dish consisting of lime, [[mango]], and [[peach]] slices in a thick sweet syrup.<ref>
* The [[Braundlae's Best]] served live [[eel]]s in a [[mint]]-and-lime hor sauce.
* The [[Chateau Elite]] served [[almond brandy]] from [[Mintarn]] with a splash of lime.
* The [[Harfin Draether]] served bowls of hot pickled limes.<ref>
* The [[Owlroost Head]] boiled [[squid]]s in lime juice laced with slices of [[lemon]] before stuffing them into [[yam]]s.<ref>
